snippet: Subra Suresh, the director of the National Science Foundation, has been chosen as the next president of Carnegie Mellon University and will assume the post on July 1.
abstract: Subra Suresh, director of the National Science Foundation, is chosen as the next president of Carnegie Mellon University.
lead_paragraph: Subra Suresh, the director of the National Science Foundation, has been chosen as the next president of Carnegie Mellon University and will assume the post on July 1.

headline.main: Carnegie Mellon Chooses a New President
headline.print_headline: Carnegie Mellon Chooses a New President
